summary: Remove the annoying \"uhhh\" sound of your raised dead
descriptionHtml:
——————————Quiet Zombies v0.1————————————

I. What is Quiet Zombies?
Why those god damn dead bodies keep bothering me!
This mod simply remove the annoying \'uhhhhhhhh\' sound (though they are funny), while all the rest is not moded.
War cry in fighting and hurt groan are still there, if you want remove them too, please tell me.


II. Different version?
QuietZombies:           remove the \'uhhh\' groan and the begging for your release. (\'release...me\')
QuietZombies_Uhhh:  remove the \'uhhh\' groan only.


III. Installation
   0. Download the mod
   1. Unzip it
   2. Put the Data folder to your game root folder , for example F:/game/The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim, select overwrite all if asked
   3. Enjoy


IV. Uninstall
   0. Open your game root folder, run RemoveQuietZombies.bat

—by Byzod
author: Byzod
